original_text: “If you love those who love you, what credit is that to you? Even sinners love those who love them.
korean_text: 너희가 만일 너희를 사랑하는 자만을 사랑하면 칭찬 받을 것이 무엇이냐 죄인들도 사랑하는 자는 사랑하느니라

sentences.original_text: If you love those who love you
what credit is that to you?
Even sinners love those who love them.
